text: @StephenKing There wouldnt BE that that # if we didn't have to put CARONA as Every death. Nurse here,25 years experience. Die from heart disease,death certificate says corona, die from cancer,death listed as Carona,die from hepatic issues,death listed as coronavirus.Stop drinking the Koolaid.
